134.content: Why does Tracer fart on/around Widowmaker?
134.title: Widowmaker

choices: Locked in a room but otherwise free
1341.content:
"There you are."

A faint gleam of moonlight reflected off the barrel of the sniper rifle as it rested out the window. The red reticle hovered over her target, ready to fulfill her contract. A long deep breath echos throughout the room as her finger slowly teases the trigger.

Clink clink....creeeeeakkkkm

In one swift movement, widowmaker turned to face the opening door as her jaw opened, "Whos there!?". No answer. Cautiously, she took a step forward and then another, keeping her gun focused on the opened door. Pushing it all the way open, she peered into hallway. A empty black corridor greeted her. It parted both ways with multiple discarded objects like dressers linging the decaying walls. Turning the corner left, she scanned the room before proceeding down it.

"I thought they taught snipers to cover their rear luv!"

Before widowmaker could turn around she felt a strong metal like object strike the back of her head. Her rifle falling down the hall and she was laying face down. Slowly, she got to all fours. "Agh! The hell...!?!" Tracer grinned as she walked around, grabbing the back of her downed foe's head as she stood in front of widowmaker. Her ass poking towards the french assassin as the orange tight latex leggings left little to be imagined.

"Overwatch has a few questions they want to ask you luv, and thankfully they allowed me to administer the sedation myself! 'Bout time! That bangers and mash is going straight through my tummy!" Before widowmaker could even begin to understand what the hell tracer meant by a sedative, her face was shoved deep into tracers ass crack. A layer of sweat and stench already populated tracers ass which gave all the more reason to why widowmaker was screaming into the Brits ass. "Its not even that bad yet! Cheers luv!" Widowmaker could feel tracers thigh lift a bit as a large, bubbly fart blew straight into her nostrils. The pungent odor was hot and rotten; reeking of expired cheese and beans. The french girl could do nothing but gag and cough on such a horrific stench as nothing but that rancid fart was available to sniff.

A small groan of comfort slipped out of tracers mouth. "Ahh much bet-ghhh" a deep rumbling roared from Tracer's stomach. "Mmm...seems you got a bit more to sniff. Get deep into my arse!" Much to widowmaker's disgust, tracer grinded her rotten ass up and down her face. Wedging her nose right against her hole as she ripped the second deadly fart. The bubbly torrent vibrated widows cheeks and jaw as her eyes gaze over. Her lungs where burning at this point as her nose frantically sniffed trying to find any untainted air to no avail. Slowly her body slowed down before finally succumbing to the odor as she passes out.

"Ahhhh that felt good! Let's get you bagged and set up at HQ!"

(Time skip)

A very groggy widowmaker begins to wake up in her new 'home'. "Ah finally, you 'wake? It's time to get this interrogation on!" Tracer cheerfully chips. What kind of situation does she find herself in?
